title: Outlook Email Issues
description: Troubleshoot Outlook email problems including sending/receiving, sync, and performance issues.

steps.title: Check Internet Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure you're connected to the internet. Check the connection status in Outlook's bottom status bar.

steps.title: Send/Receive All Folders
steps.instruction: Click Send/Receive tab → Send/Receive All Folders (or press F9) to manually sync your mailbox.

steps.title: Work Offline Mode Check
steps.instruction: Go to Send/Receive tab → make sure 'Work Offline' is NOT enabled. If it's enabled, click it to disable.

steps.title: Repair Outlook Data File
steps.instruction: Close Outlook. Run Inbox Repair Tool (scanpst.exe) from C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16. Select your .pst/.ost file and click Repair.

steps.title: Restart Outlook in Safe Mode
steps.instruction: Close Outlook. Hold Ctrl key while opening Outlook, or run 'outlook.exe /safe' to start in Safe Mode and disable add-ins that may cause issues.
